question: Esow Alben, who was seen in news recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
The 18-year-old top Indian cyclist Esow Alben was seen in news, as he recently won the gold medal in the Six Day Berlin Tournament. He won the medal in the men\'s Keirin individual event category.
Esow was the first-ever Indian to participate in the Six-Day Berlin Cycling Tournament. The event is a six-day track cycling race and all cyclists compete on every day of the competition. Esow also won bronze on the second day and a silver medal on the fourth day in the individual Keirin event. The gold medal was bagged by him at the fifth day of the event. The young cyclist is currently at world number 51 in Elite Keirin event.
